description: Nobody can resist a glass of Root Beer Float. We just canâ€™t get enough of it! Children and adults alike enjoy the sweet and fizzy taste of root beer combined with delicious vanilla ice cream. Surely, this irresistible float is perfect for hot summer days and for any occasion.&nbsp;
keywords: how to make root beer float
name: Root Beer Float

recipeInstructions.name: Put two scoops of French vanilla ice cream and into the glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Measure the bourbon and root liqueur and pour.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the root beer to the top of the glass and pour slowly for it to become foamy
